thread.title: Dead woman wrapped in bed sheets found outside Brooklyn building
thread.title_full: Dead woman wrapped in bed sheets found outside Brooklyn building | New York Post

author: Tina Moore
title: Dead woman wrapped in bed sheets found outside Brooklyn building
text:
A dead woman wrapped in bed sheets and covered in trash bags was discovered Thursday in front of a Brooklyn building, police said.
A 32-year-old man was taken into custody after police were called to the scene on Union Street in Crown Heights at around 1:45 a.m.
The unidentified woman, is believed to be between 30 and 45 years old, police said.
It’s not immediately clear how the woman died, but her body appeared to have suffered some sort of trauma, police sources said.
The man who was taken into custody was being questioned and has not yet been charged. It’s not clear what role he may have played in the woman’s death, or whether they knew each other.
